parametrized_description: There has been an accident and patients need to be transported to the hospital by either helicopter or bus. A helicopter can transport HelicopterCapacity patients per trip and takes HelicopterTripTime time. On the other hand, a bus can transport BusCapacity patients per trip and takes BusTripTime time. At least MinPatients patients need to be transported and at least MinHelicopterTripPercentage of the trips should be by helicopter. In addition, there can be at most MaxBusTrips bus trips. The objective is to minimize the total transportation time.

HelicopterCapacity.description: Number of patients that can be transported by helicopter in one trip

HelicopterTripTime.description: Time taken for one helicopter trip

BusCapacity.description: Number of patients that can be transported by bus in one trip

BusTripTime.description: Time taken for one bus trip

MinPatients.description: Minimum number of patients that need to be transported

MinHelicopterTripPercentage.description: Minimum percentage of trips that should be by helicopter

MaxBusTrips.description: Maximum number of bus trips allowed

PatientsHelicopter.description: The number of patients transported by helicopter

PatientsBus.description: The number of patients transported by bus

constraints.description: At least MinPatients patients need to be transported.
At least MinHelicopterTripPercentage of the trips should be by helicopter.
At most MaxBusTrips bus trips are allowed.
Each helicopter trip can transport up to HelicopterCapacity patients.
Each bus trip can transport up to BusCapacity patients.
